location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 24 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses a number of financial and administrative issues. The reinforcement of defences at Bushire is reported as well as the transition of power following the death of Carem Cahn [Karim Khan]. Shipped by the SuccessKetch.
